contributionDescription: I will try to create metaverse with a gamehub for players and developers. In my metaverse players will get chance to earn a token of project and mint on chain assets as a nft tokens. All this games will be in one walk thru metaverse and player will be able to pick right game for them.

contributionLinks.description: linked of  friends who will help

impactDescription: I am in the early stages of creating this project, but I have the help of people who have experience in this industry. I have a lot of time and I am enthusiastic in this environment. I learn new things every day that I use on the web3. I encourage everyone to cooperate in my project and work for optimism.
pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged for promising future deliverables or impact, which is against the grant program rules.
pwRecategorizeReason: NO, the application is categorized as an INDIVIDUAL but should be categorized as a PROJECT as the applicant talks about creating a metaverse project.
